texts.es: La señorita Fabiola tiene 20 años y es Soltera,  estudia la carrera  Licenciatura en una universidad de la ciudad de la paz, trabaja para pagar sus estudios Trabaja como Auxiliar Contable hace un año atrás su ingreso mensual es  muy bajo pero esto le permite pagar sus estudios,  este es su primer crédito con la institución,  Fabiola va a usar este préstamo de ara  distintos gastos  que implica el estudiar cómo Financiar la compra de un equipo LAPTOP HP Core I7 y una impresora Multifunción para terminar sus estudios. que durara el tiempo 5 Años,  Fabiola enfrenta retos en su estudios que son La falta de tiempo para cumplir sus obligaciones laborales, y las de sus estudios superiores vive en la Villa Pavón,  su deseo cuando termine sus estudios es poder ejercer su  profesión, mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Fabiola, 20, is single and studying degree courses at the university in the city of La Paz. 

She works to pay for her studies. 

For the past year, she has worked as an assistant accountant. Her monthly income is very low but this allows her to pay for her studies. This is her first loan with the organization. 

Fabiola will use the loan to buy items that will help her complete her studies such as a HP Core 17 laptop and multipurpose printer. Her studies will take five years. 

Fabiola faces challenges with her studies such as the lack of time to fulfill her employment duties and her studies. 

She lives in Villa Pavón. 

Once she graduates she hopes to work in her field and improve the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy a HP Core 17 laptop and multipurpose printer.

loans.name: Jean De Dieu

texts.en:
Jean De Dieu is 53 years old. He has been in the business of maize farming for the past twenty years. He would like to use this  Kiva loan to support labor costs and buy fertilizers during maize production. He needs to buy fertilizer in order to increase production. With profits from his farming he wishes to invest in his business so that in the future he can acquire machines and tractors that will enhance his farming capacity. 

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more fertilizers and support labor costs during maize production

loans.name: Mariame

texts.en:
Mariame lives in West Point, one of the most populated and well-known market areas in Montserrado county.  She is 35 years old and stopped her education at the eighth grade.  She is married, with three children ages 2, 5 and 7 yearrs.  The family lives at home, and the children attend school. 

For two years she has been cooking and selling morning "kalama" (soft rice eaten with milk, and sugar) from a bucket in various communities.  Some of the problems she faces is small income.  She enjoys how her customers buy from her and the profit she makes. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more rice, sugar, milk, coal, etc., for her business.

In the near future she hopes to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, sugar, milk, coal, etc., for her business,

loans.name: Yadira Vanessa

texts.es: Yadira de 23 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su papá y hermano. Ella es muy emprendedora ya que todos los días sale muy temprano a promocionar los diferentes productos que vende tales como lociones y joyería de enchape (anillos, aretes, pulseras, cadenas, etc.), de esta forma se gana  la vida y colabora con la economía del hogar. Desea terminar de construir un cuarto dentro de su casa ya que las paredes están cubiertas de plástico y no es seguro. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, arena, hierro y cemento de tal forma que pueda terminar de construir el cuarto y contar con mejores condiciones habitacionales.
texts.en:
Yadira, 23, lives in her home with her dad and brother. 
She is very entrepreneurial; every day she leaves very early to promote the different products that she sells such as lotions and plated jewelry (rings, bracelets, necklaces, etc.). This is how she earns a living and helps with household costs. 

She wants to finish building a room inside the house. The walls are covered in plastic and it is not safe. 

She is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to invest in buying bricks, sand, iron and cement in order to finish building the room and have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, iron and cement to build a room.

loans.name: Jeman

texts.en:
Jeman lives in West Point Montserrado County, noted as the most commercial city in Liberia. She is 30 years old and has four children between 3 and 15 years old, all of whom are in school and live at home.

For the past eight years Jeman has been frying and selling kala on a table in the local market. She enjoys the profit she makes every day, and having  money to meet her expenses makes her proud of her business. Jeman is requesting a loan to purchase more flour, sugar, pepper, etc. for her business. Her dream is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more flour, sugar, pepper, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Edwin Edgardo

texts.es: Edwin de 22 años de edad  habita con su compañera de vida y una hija de 2 años de edad. Junto a su esposa mantienen la economía de su hogar y llevan el sustento diario a su hija quien es su fuente de inspiración para seguir luchando por mejores condiciones. Ambos trabajan en una fábrica de su localidad y tienen un ingreso mensual. Habitan en casa sencilla pero propia y desean mejorarle el techo ya que se encuentra picado y cuando llueve sus pocas pertenencias y ellos se mojan. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para hacer el cambio de la cubierta del techo lo antes posible y evitar accidentes por las lluvias y vientos.
texts.en:
Edwin is 22 years old and he lives with his wife and their 2-year-old daughter.  He and his wife support the household and provide their daughter's livelihood.  She is the source of their inspiration and the reason they continue struggling for better living conditions.  They both work in a local factory and they have a monthly income.  

They live in a simple house, but it is their own. They need to improve the roof because it's falling apart and when it rains, the water gets inside and everything gets wet.

He is seeking a loan from FUSAI so that he can purchase galvanized sheets and wood to replace the roof as soon as possible to avoid future damage due to rain and wind.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets and wood in order to replace the roof of his house.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan de 38 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos de 13 años, 10 años y 2 años de edad. Juan trabaja como empleado en una fábrica de su localidad. Junto a su compañera de vida trabajan duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos y dar mejores condiciones a las que ellos han tenido acceso.  Desea reparar el  techo de su vivienda ya que las lluvias lo han dañado y el agua se filtra cuando llueve. Esta situación es muy insegura ya que sus hijos se ven afectados por la filtración de agua. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para reparar el techo lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Juan is 38 years old and he lives is his own house with his wife and their three children that are 13, 10, and 2 years old. Juan works in a local factory.  He and his wife work very hard to get by and to provide better living conditions for their children.  

He needs to repair the roof of his house because the rain has damaged it and it now leaks when it rains.  This is a very unsafe situation because his children's health is affected by the dampness and water.  He is seeking this loan from FUSAI so that he can buy galvanized sheets, wood, and fasteners to repair his roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, wood, and fasteners in order to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Rosario De Jesus

texts.es: Rosario tiene 42 años de edad y habita junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su compañero de vida, un hijo de 18 años y un par de gemelas de 7 años de edad quienes en la actualidad se encuentran estudiando. Ella  se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos en casa particular, de esta forma colabora con la economía de su hogar. Su compañero de vida también trabaja y juntos llevan el sustento de la familia. Con el fin de brindar mayor seguridad a su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de tela metálica y postes de cemento para hacer un cerco perimetral en su casa proporcionando mayor seguridad a su vivienda  y pocas pertenencias.
texts.en:
Rosario is 42 years old and lives with her family: her life partner, an 18-year-old son and two 7-year-old twins who are currently studying. She makes a living from the provision of domestic help in private homes, which enables her to help with home expenses. Her life partner also works, and the two of them sustain the family.

In order to improve the security of her family, she has decided to request a loan to FUSAI, which she will use to buy wire-mesh and cement posts to build a perimeter fence around her home. It will provide greater security to her home and their few belongings.

loans.use: to buy wire-mesh and posts to build a perimeter fence around her home

loans.name: Altagracia

texts.en:
Altagracia lives with her long-term partner and their three children in the city of San Pedro de Macoris. She has run a little store selling miscellaneous products, such as cosmetics, clothes, shoes and other products, for over six years. She started the business with her first loan from Esperanza International. Her last loan was invested in the business. 

This is Altagracia's twelfth loan. She will use it to finish building her house or to build as much as she can. Many years ago, she started construction of her house and with her business profits, she has been able to build little by little. Now she wants to use this loan to buy materials such as cement, concrete blocks, rods, and other building materials. 

Esperanza International runs a program for its good clients who are reliable in repaying their loans, who have fulfilled the commitment to grow their business, and who have shown fidelity in their groups. This allows them to take out a loan to improve the structure of their house at the same time as running their businesses and attending their group meetings. Altagracia thanks God, Esperanza International, and all of you for this opportunity. In her name and that of her family, she thanks you for your support!

loans.use: To buy concrete blocks, cement, and other building materials

loans.name: Marta De La Cruz

texts.es: Marta de la cruz, mayor de edad madre soltera con dos hijos ya mayores de edad originaria de uno de los municipios de Chinandega zona ubicada en el occidente del país donde se caracteriza por el turismo y comercio de pesca, con sus acogedoras y deliciosas playas, se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general como: ropa de interior femenina, cosméticos, ropa de niños y adultos, chinería , y otros por encargos, compra en diferentes municipios del país, su negocio es de forma ambulante y su casa de habitación, donde tiene clientes fijos y eventuales, los cuales da al contado y al crédito recuperando semanal y quincenal anteriormente tenía una pequeña pulpería pero viendo que también podría vender mercaderia en general ya que este le generaba mayores ingresos que la pulperia. El objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en capital de trabajo en la compra de mercaderia como: diversos estilos de ropà, cosméticos, chinería entre otros y el aprovechar la temporada de ventas que se incrementan mas. Marta de la cruz agradece la ayuda de los inversionistas kiva a las personas de escasos recursos para  tener fuentes de trabajo digno en países pobre económicamente como es Nicaragua
texts.en: Marta de la Cruz, single mother of two adult children is originally from Chinandega, an area located in the eastern part of the country, known for its tourism and commercial fishing, and for its welcoming and lovely beaches.  She sells general merchandise, such as ladies’ undergarments, cosmetics, adult and children’s clothing, chinoiserie, and other items to order.  She makes her purchases in different cities around the country and makes her sales on foot and from her home, where she has steady and occasional customers, and sells to them for cash and credit.  She collects every one to two weeks.  She used to have a small food store, but she realized that she could also sell general merchandise, since it generated more income than the food store.  The goal for this loan is to have working capital so she can buy general items such as different styles of clothing, cosmetics, chinoiserie, and other things, so she can take advantage of the current season, when her sales increase.  Marta de la Cruz is grateful to the Kiva lenders who help people of limited resources in poor countries like Nicaragua to have a source of dignified work.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Dúo Peronia Nueva Group

texts.es:
Dúo Peronia Nueva
este grupo esta conformado por el señor Jose Alfonso de 30 años de edad Es propietario de un local de venta de refacciones y hamburguesas tiene aproximadamente cuatro años de tenerlo es padre de 6 hijos los cuales aun estudian tiene también a su cargo dos carros los cuales sus hijos utilizan para taxis dentro de la comunidad y asi tener un ingreso mas, el esta solicitando este crédito ya que dentro de sus planes y metas es aperturar mas negocios de tortas y refacciones ya que es un negocio que le ha ayudado mucho pues son muy buenos los ingresos que obtiene y desea no quedarse allí si no que crecer cada día para poder llevar a cabo sus sueños y anhelos que tiene no solo para el si no que también para su familia y es por eso que toca las puertas de Kiva para poder adquirir un crédito para comprar mas mesas y comestible para su negocio y así poder llevar a cabo sus metas.
texts.en:
Dúo Peronia Nueva

This group includes Jose Alfonso.  He is 30 years old and has had a refreshment and hamburger stand for about four years.  He is the father of 6 children who still attend school.  He also has two cars which his children use as taxis around the community in order to have another source of income.  He is asking for this loan because his plans and goals include starting more sandwich and refreshment businesses, because this business has been very helpful and produces very good income.  He doesn’t want to stay there without growing each day so he can achieve his dreams and desires, not only for him, but for his family as well.  This is the reason he is knocking on Kiva’s doors, so that he can acquire a loan to buy more tables and food for his business.  This will help him reach his goals.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Tierra De Leones Group

texts.es: Verónica, quien en la fotografía es la primera que aparece sentada al costado izquierdo usando lentes, pertenece al Banco Comunal Tierra de Leones, de Valdivia. En este Banco los socios tienen distintos rubros tales como repostería, venta de joyas, muebles, venta de alimentos y empanadas. Verónica confecciona cojines drapeados además de hacer a crochet distintos trabajos. Este negocio lo tiene hace más de 30 años, a ella le enseño su abuela, comenzó haciéndolo solo para su hogar pero sus amigas le empezaron a pedir que hiciera para venderle y así comenzó con la venta de sus productos. Tuvo problemas solo cuando su vieja máquina, la cual se la regalo su abuela y es del año 1890, ya no funcionó así que necesita el dinero para poder comprar una nueva máquina, ya que por mientras solo puede tejer a crochet y a veces puede conseguirse una máquina de coser  para poder hacer las terminaciones de los cojines. Aparte de comprar la máquina de coser ella comprara también más insumos para sus cojines y sus tejidos a crochet. Es por esto que está muy contenta y optimista de poder vender todos sus pedidos y ansiosa además de poder recibir el dinero. Lo que más le ha gustado de poder participar en Fondo Esperanza es lo participativo que es el grupo y los hermosos vínculos que se generan.
texts.en: Veronica, the first on the left in the photograph, seated and wearing glasses, is a member of the Tierra de Leones, de Valdivia communal bank.  The members of this bank have different businesses, such as pastries, jewelry sales, furniture, food and empanada sales.  Veronica makes throw pillows and also crochets different things.  She has had this business for more than 30 years and she earned this from her grandmother.  She started out doing it for one home, but her friends taught her to take orders for items to sell.  This is how she began selling.  She had problems with her old machine, which her grandmother had given her.  It was made in 1890.  It stopped working, so she needs the money to be able to buy a new machine.  At the moment she can only knit and crochet and can sometimes borrow a machine to put the finishing touches on the pillows.  Besides buying a sewing machine, she also wants to buy supplies.  She is very happy and optimistic to be able to fill all of her orders and she is also happy to be getting the money.  What she likes best is being able to participate in Fondo Esperanza, where the members are united.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and supplies.

loans.name: La Pampa Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento LA PAMPA Está  compuesto por nueve integrantes todas mujeres, las integrantes del grupo se dedican a distintas actividades  la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Nancy, tiene 45 años tiene dos hijos de las edades de 15,  y 21 años,  su actividad es la venta de comida en su puesto de venta, la Sra. Nancy se levanta desde tempranas horas de la mañana para elaborar su comida, después sale a vender todo esto hasta medio día, con el dinero del crédito la Sra. Nancy comprara insumos para la elaboración de sus platillos, como papa, aceite y verduras, la Sra. Nancy es una persona responsable y trabajadora esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo económico que le brinda para tener una mejor calidad de vida y seguir adelante superándose por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: The LA PAMPA entrepreneurial bank is made up of nine women involved in different trades.  Nancy is the bank’s president.  She is 45 years old, has two children, ages 15 and 21, and has a food stall.  Nancy gets up in the early morning hours to prepare her food, then goes out to sell it until noon.  Nancy will use the money from this loan to buy ingredients such as potatoes, cooking oil, and vegetables so she can prepare her dishes.  She is a responsible and hard working woman and is grateful to the institution for the financial support that will help her have a better quality of life and allow her to continue succeeding for her family’s wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Nueva Estrella Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento NUEVA ESTRELLA,  Está  compuesto por ocho integrantes cinco mujeres y tres varones,   la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Gabriela,  ella se dedica a la venta de comida en restaurante que se encuentra en la zona de Tembladerani,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Gabriela va a usar este préstamo para la compra de mesas y sillas para la ampliación de su restaurante y así  de esta manera brindar mayor comodidad a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, la Sra. Gabriela va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando insumos y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener una cadena de restaurantes y así brindar un  mejor servicio a su clientela, la Sra. Sra. Gabriela es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en: The NUEVA ESTRELLA entrepreneurial bank is made up of five women and three men.  Gabriela is the bank’s president and she has a restaurant in the Tembladerani area.  This will be her first loan through the institution and Gabriela will use the money to buy tables and chairs so she can expand her restaurant and in this way provide a more comfortable atmosphere for her customers.  She is asking for this loan so that she can improve her business.  Gabriela will use these benefits to buy ingredients and therefore improve her income.  She would like to have a chain of restaurants and provide better customer service.  Gabriela is a hardworking person who is happy for this opportunity.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs.

loans.name: Martha Dayssy

texts.es: Doña Martha tiene 43 años de edad, originaria de la ciudad de Estelí, casada y madre de 3 hijos. Es profesora de primaria, durante 17 años lo ha desempeñado con mucha dedicación. Su esposo vive en el extranjero el cual le ayuda económicamente. Su meta próxima es seguir luchando para salir adelante y así ayudar a sus hijos. Su sueño es que sus hijos sean unos profesionales exitosos. Solicita el crédito para mejorar el sistema de saneamiento de su vivienda. Sus planes futuros es seguir mejorando la vivienda y garantizarles un mejor hogar a sus hijos.
texts.en: Martha is 43 years old and originally from the city of Estelí.  She is married, has three children, and has worked as an elementary school teacher, with much dedication, for the past 17 years.  Her husband lives outside the country and helps her financially.  Her next goal is to continue working hard to get ahead and help her children.  Her dream is for her children to become successful professionals.  She is asking for this loan to improve the sewage system in her home.  Her plans for the future are to continue making home improvements and guaranteeing a better home for her children.

loans.use: to install a sewage system in her home.

loans.name: Karen Fabiola

texts.es: La Sra.  Karen tiene 22 años,  ella se dedica a la venta de variedad de productos, como ser productos de Limpieza e higiene personal en un puesto de venta que se encuentran ubicada en la zona de 3 de mayo, Este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Karen utilizara  este préstamo para compra de un anaquel donde pueda vender sus productos ya que se acerca la época de lluvias y esto le perjudica en la venta ya que en algunos caso no sale a vender, pero ya tendrá un puesto donde evitara un poco que le haga mucho frio,  la razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital de trabajo, la Sra. Karen enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia, ella va a utilizar los beneficios en ahorrar para la compra de una casa ya que donde vive se encuentra en alquiler y ese es su deseo poder tener una casita para brindar mayor comodidad a su familia, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: Karen is 22 years old and sells a variety of products, such as cleaning and personal hygiene products, from a point of sale located in the 3 de mayo zone.  This will be her first loan through the institution and Karen will use the money to buy a set of shelves so she can sell her products, now that the rainy season is approaching.  This hurts her sales because she is unable to go out and sell, but she will soon have a place where she can shelter a bit from the cold.  She is asking for this loan so she can have some working capital.  Karen has challenges in her business, such as competition, and she will use these benefits to save up to buy a house.  She currently lives in a rented home and she wishes to have a home of her own so she can offer more comfort to her family.  She is happy and grateful to the institution for providing this opportunity.

loans.use: to buy shelves.

loans.name: Lucas

texts.es:
Lucas se dedica a realizar trabajos de soldadura, la mayor parte de su clientela está en su comunidad, por su buen servicio ha aumentado sus clientes, necesita comprar una mejor máquina de soldar de mayor potencia, por esta razón necesita un crédito de un millón cuarenta mil colones (¢1.040.000), Lucas comenta que su objetivo es brindar sus 
servcios a otras comunidades para aumentar sus ingrsos.
texts.en: Lucas works as a welder.  Most of his customers are from his local community and his number of customers has increased because of his good service.  He needs to buy a better welding machine with greater power, so he needs a loan of ¢1.040.000.  Lucas says that his goal is to provide his services to other communities so that he can increase his income.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine.

loans.name: Hilma

texts.es: Hilma se dedica a la fabricación de muebles, sus originales diseños han atraído una importante clientela,  además ofrece  sus productos en  los locales  dedicados a la venta de muebles, Hilma necesita una máquina y herramientas y otros materiales  para los acabados de los muebles. Agradece el apoyo financiero con el cual puede salir adelante con su proyecto.
texts.en: Hilma makes furniture of original design and she has attracted important customers.  She also offers her products in furniture shops.  Hilma needs a machine, some tools, and other supplies to put the finishing touches on her furniture.  She is grateful for the financial support that will allow her to move ahead with her plans.

loans.use: to buy tools and supplies.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario es un señor muy trabajador y esforzado, se dedica a darle mantenimiento a los jardines de su comunidad, cuenta con una amplia clientela y su objetivo es brindar un buen y satisfactorio servicio a sus clientes, necesita un crédito por un millón cuarenta mil colones (¢1.040.000) con este dinero comprará una motoguaraña (máquina de cortar césped) y otras herramientas útiles y necesarias para el trabajo que realiza. Mario agradece la oprtunidad de financiamiento que se le brinda.
texts.en: Mario is a very hardworking man who works as a gardener in his local community.  He has many customers and his goal is to provide good, satisfactory service to his customers.  He needs a loan of ¢1.040.000 to buy a lawnmower and other useful tools for his work.  Mario is grateful for the opportunity for financial support.

loans.use: to buy a lawnmower.

loans.name: Erlinda  Graciel

texts.es: Erlinda es una señora de 36 años muy trabajadora; ella vive en Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, una ciudad muy comercial y productiva, es conocida también porque en la zona vive la Comunidad Tsachila una etnia muy representativa e importante de Ecuador. Erlinda anteriormente tuvo un compromiso del cual procreó un hijo que ahora tiene 8 años, el mismo que fracasó en vista de que no contaba con el apoyo económico de su cónyuge y también porque no la dejaba emprender en ningún negocio para poder sacar adelante a su familia. Hace 5 años conoció a Julio un señor muy responsable con quien vive actualmente y tienen una hija de 4 años. Ellos viven en una casa arrendada. Su hijo mayor estudia en una escuela un poco lejana al sector y viaja  todos los días en bus, en cambio su hija pasa con ella en casa. Su esposo es un señor muy trabajador y responsable, actualmente lleva ya 8 años prestando sus servicios de mantenimiento en una finca, pero sus ingresos no son suficientes para los gastos del hogar, es por ello que su esposa Erlinda hace 3 años decidió emprender en el negocio de venta de ropa interior y cosméticos, al mismo que le dedica de 3 a 4 horas diarias visitando a sus clientes de casa en casa, el resto del día ella dedica el tiempo a su familia. Ahora ambos son el sustento de su hogar, trabajan diariamente para salir adelante y para cumplir uno de sus sueños, contar con su propio local para tener mejores ingresos y así poder comprar su casa. Fundación Alternativa le ha dado la oportunidad de mejorar sus ingresos dándole un pequeño crédito para la compra de la mercadería ya que nos comenta que esta temporada es muy buena para invertir por las festividades venideras de navidad. Está muy agradecida con la institución ya que le abrieron las puertas para mejorar económicamente porque en otras instituciones no querían apoyarla con esta cantidad de dinero. Está muy segura que mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Erlinda is 36 years old and a very hardworking woman who lives in Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas; a very commercial and productive city.  It’s also known for having a very important ethic group in the Tsachila community, representative of Ecuador.  Erlinda was previously engaged and had a son who is now 8 years old.  The engagement failed because her partner did not support her financially and also because he would not allow her to start any businesses to help get the family ahead.  She met Julio five years ago and he is a very responsible man with whom she now lives and they have a four year old daughter together.

They live in a rented home.  Her oldest son attends a school that is a bit far away and he travels by bus every day.  Her daughter stays home with her.  Her husband is a hardworking and responsible gentleman who has been doing farm work for hire for the past eight years, but his income is not enough to cover the household expenses.  For this reason, Erlinda decided to start a clothing sales and cosmetic business three years ago.  She works it 3-4 hours a day, visiting her customers door to door, and spends the rest of the day caring for her family.

Now both work to sustain the household and work every day to get ahead and achieve one of their dreams of having a shop so that they can have a better income and be able to buy a house.  Fundación Alternativa has provided them with the opportunity to increase their income, by providing a small loan to buy merchandise.  She tells us that this is a good season to invest in merchandise because of the approaching Christmas season.  She is very grateful to the institution because they have opened the door for her to improve financially, while other institutions did not want to support her with this amount of money.  She is certain that her quality of life will improve.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Berta Rubidia

texts.es:
Berta, está casada, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, es una persona que se preocupa por el bienestar de los miembros de su familia es por ello que por iniciativa propia emprendió su negocio de venta de mariscos, con el fin de ayudar a su esposo en los gastos de su hogar.
Invertirá en la compra de pescado, conchas, moluscos, camarones y otros, para mantener una variedad que satisfaga la necesidad de sus clientes, generar las ganancias necesarias para cubrir gastos en su casa y pagar el crédito.
Sueña con reparar su vivienda, mejorar la alimentación de su familia y que sus hijos tengan acceso a una educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Berta is married and lives with her husband and two children.  She is one who is concerned about her family’s wellbeing, so she started a seafood business in order to help her husband with the household expenses.

She will use the money from this loan to buy clams, mussels, shrimp, and other things to maintain a variety to satisfy her customer demand, cover her household expenses, and repay the loan.  She dreams of fixing up her home, improving her family’s diet, and for her children to have access to a quality education.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Silvino Jose

texts.es: Silvino es originario de la Ciudad de Estelí. De 30 años de edad, casado y padre ejemplar de 3 hijos. Su oficio es de obrero de tabaco, el cual lo desempeña hace 17 años. Es su único trabajo en el que lo desempeña duramente para darle la mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Su meta próxima  es tener un hogar limpio con las mejores condiciones de acueductos. Solicita el financiamiento para saneamiento de vivienda con el fin de mejorar las condiciones sanitarias de su hogar. Sus planes futuros es seguir mejorando la infraestructura  de su vivienda y garantizar sanidad e higiene.
texts.en: Silvinio is originally from the city of Esteli.  He’s 30 years old, married, and the exemplary father of three children.  He is a tobacco worker and has been doing this for 17 years.  This is his only job and he works hard to provide his family a good quality of life.  His next goal is to have a clean home with the best conditions.  He is asking for a loan to sanitize his home so he can improve the health conditions.  His future plans are to continue improving his home’s infrastructure and guarantee healthy and hygienic conditions.

loans.use: to sanitize his home.

loans.name: Omie

texts.en: Omie is 30 years old and lives in West Point, one of the most populated and well-known market areas in Montserrado County. She has two children aged 10 months old and 5 years old. Her older child is in school and both children live at home. For two years, Omie has been selling palm oil from a table in the local market. She enjoys how quickly her product can be finished. She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil for her business. Her dreams are to open a store and to educate her two children.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Alex

texts.en:
Alex is from the Ruhiga area of the Kantozi-Kamwenge district. He has a coffee store in a nearby trading center and also operates a coffee farm where he harvests his own stock to sell. He is married with one child and also looks after his elderly parents because they are too old to take care of themselves. Alex has applied for a loan of UGX 600,000 to buy fertilizers and pesticides for his coffee plantation and to add more stock in his coffee store. 

Alex is a very hardworking and honest man. His major challenges are pests and diseases that attack his coffee on the farm and thieves who steal his coffee while it is still in the garden. He is thankful that Kiva lenders are willing to partner with him.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for his coffee farm

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José, está casado, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos de 16, 12 y 1 años, Su actividad económica es el servicio de transporte de personas y siembra de granos básicos (maíz y frijol), el aprendió estos oficios de su padre, trabaja de 5:30 a.m. hasta 4:00 p.m., por el momento no ha tenido ningún problema en realizar los das actividades.
El crédito lo invertirá en reparación del vehículo e insumos agrícolas para sembrar granos básicos, con esto el mejorara su servicio, tendrá una mayor producción y se verá beneficiado con ganancias superiores que le ayudaran para pagar la deuda adquirida.
Su prioridad es darle a sus hijos lo necesario para una vida digna, educación superior, por lo que se esforzará en sacar el mejor provecho del crédito.
texts.en:
Jose is married and lives with his wife and three children, ages 16, 21, and 1.  He provides transportation services and also raises basic grains (corn and beans).  He learned this from his father and works from 5:30 am to 4:00 pm.  Up to now he has not had any problems.

He will use the money from this loan to repair his vehicle and buy farming supplies so he can plant basic grains.  This way he will be able to improve his services, have better production, and increase his income that will help him repay this loan.

His priority is to provide a dignified life for his children, and a higher education.  He will work hard to obtain better benefits from this loan.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle and buy supplies.

loans.name: New Group

texts.en: Sentho is the featured leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Sentho was born in Lunsar town 40 years ago. She is married to a fisherman. For many years now, Sentho has been selling onions and ready-to-wear-clothes. This is the first loan that Sentho and her group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they hope to expand their respective businesses, make more sales, and consequently improve their living conditions. Sentho will use her share of the loan (800,000 SLL) to expand her business by buying onions and ready-to-wear-clothes in large quantities to add to her inventory.

loans.use: to buy onions and ready-to-wear-clothes in large quantities

loans.name: Koya Decendants Group

texts.en:
Kadiatu is the featured leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Kadiatu was born in the Kambia district of northern Sierra Leone 40 years ago. She sells palm oil (the country’s most popular cooking oil) and has been a businesswoman for many years now. 

With the help of this loan, Kadiatu and her group mate hope to expand their respective businesses, make more sales, and consequently improve their living conditions. Kadiatu will use her share of the loan (800,000 SLL) to buy a larger quantity of palm oil to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of palm oil to add to her current stock

loans.name: One Word Group Old Road

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present the members of the “One Word” group. These are small-scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to apply for a loan of 500,000 SLL apiece to invest in their respective businesses. 

Abubakarr is the featured leader of this group. Abubakarr is 25 years old, and he is married with 1 child. Abubakarr sells ready-to-wear-clothes and has been in this business for many years now. He has requested this loan in order to buy clothes in large quantities to add to his current stock.

loans.use: to buy clothes in large quantities to add to his current stock

loans.name: Women Of Progress Group

texts.en:
Meet the members of the “Women of Progress” group from Waterloo, a small town in western Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of 500,000 SLL apiece. With the help of this loan they hope to expand their respective businesses, make more sales, and consequently improve their living conditions. 

Wendy is the featured leader of this group. The 39-year-old is married to an “okada driver” (motorbike taxi driver) and they have 3 children together. Wendy has been a businesswoman for many years now; she sells “achekeh” (food made from cassava roots). With her share of this loan, she will buy a large quantity of ingredients in order to cook a larger amount of achekeh to sell.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of ingredients to cook achekeh to sell

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es: Carlos de 22 años de edad es casado y habita en casa humilde pero propia desde hace 5 años junto con su esposa e hija de 14 meses. Es muy emprendedor y visionario. Desde hace mucho tiempo se hizo de una lancha la cual es su principal herramienta de trabajo. Se gana la vida mediante la renta de su lancha, todos los días se puede encontrar a las orillas del lago de su municipio listo para dar paseos a turistas interesados en el servicio.  Desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda la cual no ha terminado de construir ya que sus ingresos no le alcanzar para hacer todo el desembolso. Esta es la razón por la que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de hierro, cemento, ladrillo, arena y lamina para terminar las paredes y el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Carlos is 22 years old and married. He lives in a humble house but of his own, together with his wife and 14-month-old daughter. He is an entrepreneur and a visionary. A long time ago he purchased a boat, which is his main source of income. He makes a living by renting his boat. He can be found every day around the shores of the lake in his municipality, where he gives tours to the tourists that are interested in his services.

He would like to improve the conditions of his home, which he has not been able to finish building because his income has not been sufficient so far. This is the reason why he is requesting this loan to FUSAI, which he will invest in the purchase of iron, cement, brick, sand and metal sheeting to finish the walls and roof of his home.

loans.use: To buy: iron, cement, brick, sand and metal sheeting to finish the walls and roof of his home

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose came to the US from the Dominican Republic over twenty years ago. He has had ample experience working for others as a cook and selling groceries, but now he is ready to pursue his dream of running his very own business.  

Last month, he opened De Lo Mio Restaurant, a Dominican restaurant in Perth Amboy, New Jersey. As a startup, he faces the challenge of establishing his brand and meeting his targets for revenue. However, Jose is confident that his experience, along with help from a microloan, will give him the tools needed to succeed.

Jose will use this loan to buy furniture and food inventory for De Lo Mio Restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase furniture and food inventory for a Dominican startup restaurant.

loans.name: Phoeun

texts.en:
Residing in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Phoeun is 58 years old and a widowed mother. She is in charge of a household consisting of eight children. For the sake of her kids, she struggles for a living via rice farming on a two-hectare area. Having engaged in the current business for ages, she is able to generate about 31,000 KHR per day. 

Phoeun, who has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for the past three cycles, has repaid her past loan completely. The loan has enabled her to improve her living condition better than before. 

Now, she is seeking an education loan for her son, who wants to hold a bachelor’s degree in mathematics. She hopes her son will obtain a good job after graduation.

loans.use: to pay for her son's tuition fee.

loans.name: Help We Self Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Help We Self” group. They are small-scale businesswomen based in Waterloo, a small town in western Sierra Leone. Together, they are requesting a loan of 3,500,000 SLL. With this loan, they hope to expand their respective businesses, make more profit, and consequently improve their standard of living. 

The featured leader of this group is Fatmata. Fatmata is 45, she is married to a teacher, and the couple has 6 children. Fatmata sells palm oil (the country’s most popular cooking oil), onions, margi (used to give sauce a sweet taste), salt, pepper, and other foodstuffs. She has requested this loan in order to buy these food items in bulk to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy palm oil, onions, margi, salt, pepper, and other food items in bulk to add to her current stock

loans.name: Renie

texts.en: Renie is a 25-year-old married man who lives in Bañadero, Ozamiz City, with his family. To make a living, he provides transportation services within their community. He has been providing these services for 10 years. He joined GDMPC and requested a loan to buy motor accessories in order to provide better service. He always finds ways to earn money for the family. In the future, Renie wants to provide his family with a comfortable house.

loans.use: to buy motorbike accessories that will allow him to provide better service

loans.name: Cherry Dae

texts.en:
Cherry Dae is married with two children. She is 25 years old and lives in Centro Napu, Tudela, Philippines.

Cherry Dae is a farmer and grows rice crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for four years. She has requested a loan to acquire additional fertilizers and farming tools, such as a farm tractor, chisel plow, electric fencing, pitchforks, feeders and waterers, etc.

Cherry Dae has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, she hopes to save for future emergencies.

loans.use: to acquire additional fertilizers and farming tools such as a farm tractor, chisel plow, electric fencing, pitchforks, feeders and waterers, etc.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel de 39 años de edad, es casado y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa y tres hijas de 18 años, 13 años y 6 años de edad.  Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado comprar una JET SKI la  cual es su principal herramienta de trabajo ya que todos los días la renta a los turistas que llegan a su localidad y quieren tener la aventura. De esta forma se gana la vida y sostiene la economía de su hogar. Desea mejorar las condiciones habitacionales de su familia, por lo que desea mejorar las condiciones del piso de su casa el cual se encuentra deteriorado y dañado por el tiempo de tenerlo. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo de piso, cemento y arena que le permita hacer la mejora respectiva.
texts.en:
Miguel is 39 years old, married and lives in his own home together with his wife and three daughters aged 18, 16 and 6 years old. With great efforts he has managed to purchase a jet ski, which is his main source of income since he rents it every day to the tourists that arrive to his town and would like to have an adventure. He makes a living from this and manages to cover the expenses of his household.

He would like to improve the housing conditions of his family, specifically the floor of his home which is worn and damaged because of its age. This is the reason why he is requesting this loan to FUSAI, which he will use to buy the brick, cement and sand that will enable his to make this particular improvement.

loans.use: to buy brick, cement and sand to repair the floor of his home

loans.name: Lainy

texts.en: A young married mother of one little kid who resides in the Sangke district of Battambang province, Lainy is one breadwinner in a family striving to make a living through rice farming and her business of selling cassava. She has been involved in this business for several years. To earn additional income, her husband works for others for a fee. Lainy is applying for her first loan through VisionFund (Kiva's partner). The requested education loan will help her to pursue her bachelor's degree majoring in Finance and Banking. This entire loan will be spent on her tuition. She hopes that she can get a better job to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To pursue her bachelor's degree majoring in Finance and Banking

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es: Roberto de 33 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su grupo familiar conformado por su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 5 años y 2 meses de edad. Él se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios de seguridad en una fábrica de su localidad.  Su compañera de vida vende productos de belleza por catálogo y juntos llevan el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de mejorar las condición de su vivienda solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento y arena para encementar el piso ya que el que tiene es de tierra y no es saludable para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Roberto, 33, lives with his immediate family consisting of his life companion and their two children who are 5 years and 2 months of age respectively in his own house.  He earns his living working as a security guard at a local firm.  His life companion sells beauty products via catalog and they support their home together.  

Aiming at improving living conditions at home, he’s asking FUSAI for this loan to buy cement and sand to lay a cement floor since the floor now is dirt and not healthy for his children.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: María de 25 años de edad reside en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañero de vida y su hija de un año con ocho meses y un sobrino de seis años de edad. Ella se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos y además cuida a su sobrino ya que sus padres tuvieron que emigrar al extranjero en busca de mejores condiciones de vida. Su esposo trabaja y le ayuda en la economía del hogar, juntos buscan las formas de mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Actualmente el piso de su casa es de tierra y desea mejorarlo; por lo que ha adquirido un crédito con FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena  y grava para encementar el piso y dar condiciones más saludables a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María, 25, lives in her own house with her life companion, their one-year-eight-month-old daughter and her six-year-old nephew.  She provides domestic services and also cares for her nephew since his parents had to go abroad seeking better living conditions.  Her husband works and helps her with the household economy.  They seek ways to improve their living conditions together.  

The floor at home is currently dirt and she wants to improve it which is why she’s asked FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, sand and gravel to lay a cement floor and provide healthier conditions for her children.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to lay a cement floor at home.

loans.name: Wendy Maricela

texts.es: Wendy de 24 años de edad es soltera y habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar. Ella trabaja como mesera en un restaurante de su localidad con lo que logra cubrir sus gastos y colaborar con la economía del hogar. Habita en condiciones muy humildes pero poco a poco junto a su familia buscan las oportunidades para mejorar.  Su casa es de ladrillo pero actualmente las paredes no está repellada y con las lluvias las paredes se están lavando y  deteriorando por lo que es necesario que se repellen para evitar que se sigan arruinando. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra para hacer la mejora necesaria.
texts.en:
Wendy, 24, is single living with her immediate family in her own house.  She works as a waitress in a local restaurant and is able to cover her expenses and collaborate with household expenses.  She lives in very humble conditions but her family has gradually been seeking opportunities for improvement.  

Her house is brick but the walls are unsealed and when it rains the walls erode away and deteriorate which is why it’s necessary that they be sealed to prevent further wear.  She’s asking  FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, sand and to pay labor costs to do this necessary improvement.

loans.use: to buy building supplies and pay labor costs to seal the walls.

loans.name: Savan

texts.en: Savan is a 55-year-old father of nine children. Nowadays, he resides in Ratanak Mondul district of Battambang province where he grows maize and rice as the main source of income to support his entire family. Savan is a fourth-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). He has succeeded in repaying his previous loans wisely. The loans supported his business and allowed him to stabilize his living conditions better than before. Savan is now requesting another loan from VisionFund. For this cycle, he wants to focus on his son, who wants to become a doctor. Savan will use the entire loan to pay for tuition  for his son. He hopes that his son will get a job after graduating.

loans.use: To pay for his son's tuition

loans.name: Sinat's Group

texts.en:
A mother of three kids residing in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Sinat is a 42-year-old rice grower. She does rice farming on ten hectares of farmland. It is the business that she has engaged in for more than ten years. Besides her agribusiness, her family can earn additional income via her husband’s occupation as a school teacher. 

Including this loan, she is a fifth-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has completely repaid her past loan wisely, and has improved her living condition at a gradual pace. 

Now, she formed a group of five to get a new loan. She and the rest of her borrowers are seeking the same loan amount of 1,400,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy twelve sacks of fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes that his purchase will boost her crop output on time, and she will gain a good yield.

loans.use: to buy twelve sacks of fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Carlos Marvin

texts.es: Carlos  de 19 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a sus padres. Carlos es un joven trabajador y visionario. Trabaja muy duro para ayudar a su familia.  Se gana la vida trabajando como empleado en una fábrica de la  localidad, de su salario le ayuda a la familia en la economía y en las mejoras que necesita su vivienda. Su casa es muy humilde hecha a base de lámina la cual se encuentra en un terreno que necesita un muro de contención para que no se lave el terreno de su vivienda con las corrientes de las aguas lluvias. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, ladrillo, arena y grava para hacer lo antes posible el muro que le permita proteger el terreno y su casa.
texts.en:
Carlos, 19, lives with his parents in a house they own.  Carlos is a forward-looking, hardworking young man.   He works hard to help his family and earns a living as an employee in a local factory.  He’s able to help his family’s economy and with home improvements with the salary he earns.

His house is very humble and made of metal sheeting and is located on a lot that needs a retaining wall so that the soil won’t wash away in water currents caused by rain.  He’s asking FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, sand, gravel and bricks to build a retaining wall as soon as possible to protect the land and his house.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to erect a retaining wall.

loans.name: Sibely Keith

texts.es:
Sibely es una joven de 19 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica en el distrito de Parcona con sus padres y hermanos, ella es muy trabajadora, entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Sibely se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Contabilidad.
Por iniciativa propia, Sibely trabaja como vendedora en una empresa comercial de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Sibely se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprara una computadora, la cual utilizara para sus estudios,así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser una gran profesional.
texts.en:
Sibely, 19, is a single young woman living in the city of Ica, Parcona District, with her parents and siblings.  She’s very hardworking and enthusiastic and very much seeks self-improvement.  Thanks to her effort and support from her parents, Sibely’s studying the professional career of Accounting.

On her own initiative, she works as a saleswoman in a store in her city.  She works every day for about 8 hours and believes she does well thanks to her dedication and effort.

She’s very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided she will buy a computer that she’ll use for her school work.  She will thus continue working and striving to reach her great dream: to become a great professional.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Araceli Esperanza

texts.es: Araceli Esperanza mayor de edad casada originaria de uno de los municipios del norte del país, zona que se caracteriza por el comercio, venta de oro, ganado, entre otros, es propietaria de una hermosa pulperia que ha logrado surtir poco a poco con los créditos que ha obtenido, ofrece productos de consumo para el hogar como: arroz, azúcar, frijoles, leche en polvo, golosinas, gaseosas, cafe, sazonadores, cebollas, tomates, huevos, jugos, pollo, carne, embutidos, galletas, detergentes, shampoo, pan, jabón, al igual que cosméticos, ropa entre otros, ella desde muy temprano inicia su jornada de trabajo finalizando ya bastante tarde y así les ofrece mejor atención a sus clientes, el objetivo de este crédito es para capital de trabajo en la compra de productos de consumo del hogar y asi obtener variedades de productos que ofrecer a sus clientes. Araceli Agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.
texts.en:
Araceli Esperanza is a married adult from one of the towns in the north of the country, a zone noted for commerce, gold sales, cattle and others.  She owns a beautiful grocery store that she’s succeeded in stocking little by little with loans she’s gotten.  She sells basic home consumption staple goods like rice, sugar, beans, powdered milk, snacks, soft-drinks, coffee, seasoning, onions, tomatoes, eggs, juices, chicken, meat, sausages, cookies, detergents, shampoo, bread, soap as well as cosmetics and clothes, among others.

She starts her work day very early in the morning and ends quite late thereby offering better customer service.  This loan’s objective is for working capital to buy household goods to have a variety of products handy to offer her customers.  Araceli is very grateful for the support Kiva lenders give people of low economic resources.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Bertulfo De Jesús

texts.es: Bertulfo a sus 62 años de edad, vive con su esposa y es padre de 3 hijos. Durante 9 años ha tenido su propio negocio en el que ofrece alimentos fritos, pollo asado, helados, gaseosas entre otros, pero por cuestiones ajenas a su voluntad, hace 2 meses tuvo que trasladarse para otro barrio a vivir en una casa arrendada en la que reubicó nuevamente su negocio, pero debido a eso, su capital de trabajo disminuyó porque el proceso de traslado se demoró algunos días, afectando así sus inventarios e insumos que disminuyeron, sin embargo ha seguido trabajando con los pocos insumos que le quedan. Su empuje, perseverancia y las ganas de progresar lo han impulsado para solicitar el apoyo del crédito, con el que desea comprar surtido al por mayor (gaseosas, cervezas, helados, pollo, mecato, entre otros), de esta manera podrá aumentar su capital de trabajo y seguirá luchando para que su negocio siga en funcionamiento y le permita continuar velando por el bienestar de su familia, además desea ahorrar para que, en un futuro pueda adquirir una casa propia en la que  desea disfrutar de una vejez más tranquila y una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de su esposa y sus hijos.
texts.en:
Bertulfo, 62, lives with his wife and is father of three children.  He’s had his own business for nine years selling fried food, roasted chicken, ice-cream and soft-drinks, among others, but due to circumstances beyond his control he had to move to live in a rented house in a new neighborhood two months ago.  He reestablished his business there once again but because of this his capital decreased because the move took a few days which led to a drop in inventory and supplies.  However, he’s continued working with the few ingredients he has left.

His drive, perseverance and wish to make progress have pushed him to request support from the loan that he wants to use to buy stock merchandise at wholesale (soft-drinks, beer, ice-cream, chicken, snacks, etc.) to be able to increase working capital and continue to strive so his business can remain in operation and allow him to continue watching over his family’s well-being.  He also wants to save so that he can get a house of his own in future where he can enjoy a more tranquil old-age and better quality of life in the company of his wife and children.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise at wholesale.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.es: Abraham is both an architect and a farmer who believes in sharing knowledge. He has turned his home into a technology demonstration center where he gives workshops on photovoltaics, solar water heaters, and vermiculture/compost, among others. He also farms as a hobby, with goats, sheep, cows and poultry. He is investing in a 4 cubic meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester to produce bioenergy, biofertilizer, and as a teaching tool. The biodigester will convert his animal waste into methane-rich biogas and a potent biofertilizer complementing his existing compost. Abraham will use the biogas to displace the liquefied petroleum gas he currently uses on-site as cooking fuel. The digester will fit in perfectly with his other eco-technologies. He will promote the use of anaerobic digestion as both a waste management tool as well as energy and fertilizer production method in his region. This loan represents 90% of the total cost of his Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.
texts.en:
Abraham is both an architect and a farmer who believes in sharing knowledge. He has turned his home into a technology demonstration center where he gives workshops on photovoltaics, solar water heaters and vermiculture/compost, among others. He also farms as a hobby, with goats, sheep, cows and poultry. 

Abraham is investing in a four cubic meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester to produce bioenergy, biofertilizer, and as a teaching tool. The biodigester will convert his animal waste into methane-rich biogas and a potent biofertilizer complementing his existing compost. Abraham will use the biogas to displace the liquefied petroleum gas he currently uses on-site as cooking fuel. The digester will fit in perfectly with his other eco-technologies. He will promote the use of anaerobic digestion as both a waste management tool and as an energy and fertilizer production method in his region. This loan represents 90% of the total cost of his Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.use: to purchase a four cubic meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester

loans.name: Katy Erika

texts.es:
Katy es una mujer de 22 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con sus padres y su pequeño hijo, ella es madre soltera, trabajadora, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Katy no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Katy trabaja como obrera de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Katy se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizara el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea poner piso de concreto a su hogar, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de darle una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Katy, 22, is a woman living with her parents and young son in the city of Cañete.  She’s a hardworking single mother who focuses all her efforts into getting ahead.  Unfortunately, due to the lack of economic resources and the need to go to work, Katy was unable to study a professional career.

On her own initiative, Katy works as a field hand on a large agricultural estate in her city.  She works for about 10 hours every day and believes she does well because of her dedication and effort.

Katy’s grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided she will make home improvements.  She wants to install a cement floor.  She will continue working and striving to reach her great dream: to provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.en:
Leonardo is 53 years old and lives in Tonggo, Tudela, Philippines. He is married with three children. 

Leonardo has a sari-sari store business and earns approximately PHP 6,000 each month doing this type of work. He has requested a loan to purchase additional goods to sell, such as assorted breads, coffee, milk, sugar, candies, sardines, toothpaste, drinks, junk foods, beauty soaps, detergents, etc.

Leonardo has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, he hopes to provide for his family's daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods to sell such as assorted breads, coffee, milk, sugar, candies, sardines, toothpaste, drinks, junk foods, beauty soaps, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Mary Salome

texts.en:
Mary Salome is 32 years old and lives in Basirang,Tudela, Philippines. She is single with no children. 

Mary Salome has a motorcycle business and earns approximately PHP 3000 each month. A member of PMPC for two years, she has requested a loan to purchase materials for motorcycle repair.

Mary Salome hopes to save for future needs.

loans.use: to purchase materials for motorcycle repair

loans.name: Jhandher Marlon

texts.es:
Jhandher vive en al ciudad de Pucallpa y para poder salir adelante y solventar los gastos de su hogar, ya que es padre de un pequeño de 1 año, Trabaja como obrero en una pequeña empresa de ensamblaje, el labora alrededor de 9 horas al día y cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable y cumplido.

Jhandher está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá comprar materiales de construcción como clavos, calaminas, madera, entre otros para realizar mejoras en el techo de la vivienda que habita, así podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir luchando por cumplir su sueño:2 Darle una buena educación a su hijo y tener su propio taller de ensamblaje.
texts.en:
Jhandher lives in the city of Pucallpa and to get ahead and be able to cover household expenses since he’s father of a one-year-old little one works as a laborer in a small assembly plant; he works about 9 hours daily and believes he does well because he’s responsible and correct.

Jhandher is grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to buy building supplies like nails, plywood and lumber, among others, to repair the roof at home where he lives thus improving his family’s quality of life and continue striving to reach his dream: to provide his son with a good education and to own an assembly shop of his own.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair his roof.

loans.name: Sofia Rita

texts.es:
Sofia es una mujer de 46 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su esposo y sus hijos, ella es trabajadora, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Sofia no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Sofia trabaja como cocina en un restaurante de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Sofia se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizara el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea tarrajear y pintar las paredes de su hogar, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Sofia is a 46 year old woman who lives in Nazca with her husband and children. She is a hard-working, enthusiastic person who puts a lot of effort into helping her family get ahead. Unfortunately, due to insufficient financial resources and having to work, Sofia was not able to get a degree.

On her own initiative Sofia works in the kitchen of a restaurant in her town. She works every day for approximately 10 hours and thinks she is doing well because of her dedication and effort.

Sofia is very thankful to Kiva lenders, since she will be able to make improvements to her house thanks to their help, as she wishes to plaster and paint the walls of her home. She will continue to work and strive to achieve her big dream of seeing her children turn into good professionals.

loans.use: to make improvements to her house

loans.name: Balvina Elias

texts.es: Balvina Elias lleva ya recibiendo el apoyo de fape y kiva desde hace mas de tres años, esta agradecida por tal ayuda. Desde hace mas de 18 años se ha dedicado a la crianza de marranos y solicita el crédito para la compra de marranos, concentrado  y vitaminas. ya que se aserca la epoca de fin de años y es cuendo sus animales mas se venden Ha sido bien responsable en sus pagos y no a caido en mora espera nuevamente el apoyo de Kiva para seguir con su negocio.
texts.en: Balvina Elias has been getting support from FAPE and KIVA for more than three years and she’s grateful for it.  She’s been raising pigs for more than 18 years and is asking for this loan to buy pigs, feed concentrate and vitamins for the end-of-year season when these animals sell the most is approaching.  He’s been quite responsible with her installment payments and has never been late.  She’s hoping once again for Kiva’s support to continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise.

loans.name: Yong's Group

texts.en:
Yong, who is 41 years old, is the mother of three children—who still count on her. 

To overcome the family’s hardship, she grows rice as the main source of income, whereas her husband works for others for a fee. She has been involved in her current business for 10 years. With VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), she is in the sixth cycle of her loans and a leader of a group of four borrowers. 

The past loans, which she has repaid back completely, have upgraded her living condition better than before. 

As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a good yield from her business, better than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her crop

loans.name: Sophang's Group

texts.en:
Sophang, who is 20 years old and married, lives in Moung Russey district of Battambang province, where rice farming is the most popular crop. Sopang  farms rice as her main source of income. This business returns her about 30,300 KHR per day. 

Now requesting her first loan for with Kiva partner VisionFund, Sophang leads a group of four. She will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a yield better than last year's.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide for her crop

loans.name: Luis Armando

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 20 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su esposa y suegros,el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Luis no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Luis trabaja como obrero de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Luis se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizara la construcción de una habitación en casa de sus suegros, el cual utilizara para vivir con su esposa, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Luis is a 20 year old man who lives with his wife and in-laws in the city of Cañete in the district of Imperial. He is very hardworking and enthusiastic and makes every effort to get ahead. Unfortunately Luis has not been able to study for a professional career due to a lack of resources and the need to work.

On his own initiative, Luis works as a farm laborer on an estate in the city. He works every day for approximately 10 hours and believes that he is doing well because of his dedication and sacrifice.

Luis is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, he will be able to add a room to his in-law’s home, which he will use to live in with his wife. Thus he will continue working and aspiring to fulfill his great dream, that of owning a home.

loans.use: to add a room.

loans.name: Victor Miguel

texts.es:
Victor vive en la provincia de Ica, para poder tener ingresos y poder solventar sus gastos de manutención el trabaja en el área de almacén de una empresa de transportes de su ciudad, Victor trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y cree que le está yendo viene en su trabajo es porque es responsable.

Victor está agradecido con el apoyo que le han brindado los prestamistas kiva ay que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una refrigeradora para su madre con lo cual mejorara su calidad de vida ya que actualmente no cuenta con este artefacto y no puede conservar sus alimentos en buenas condiciones, de esta manera mejorara su calidad de vida y seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener una casa propia”
texts.en:
Victor lives in Ica Province.  To earn income and be able to cover household expenses he works in the warehouse of a transport firm in his city. He works about 10 hours daily and believes he’s doing well at work because he’s responsible.

Victor is grateful for the support Kiva lenders have given him because thanks to it he will be able to buy a refrigerator for his mother which will improve her quality of life since she currently does not own this appliance and is unable to keep her food in good condition.  He will thus improve her quality of life and continue striving to make his greatest dream reality: to own a house.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.en:
Sabina lives in the Kisii area of Kenya. She is married and has 6 children. She has the following: a cow, poultry, motorcycle, and mosquito net, but does not have a pig, pump, bicycle, automobile, electricity, solar power, running water, sewing machine, TV, or DVD. Sabina has practiced farming for 4 years. Her primary sources of income are milk, eggs, and transportation services.

Sabina stated that what is most enjoyable about farming is feeding her cows, while her biggest challenge is getting a ready market for selling milk. Animals on the farm have been given the name of Nyabite.

When asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, Sabina replied, "It offers good and fair interest rates." She was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required microfinance training session and answered, "How to manage a loan."

Sabina's highest monthly expense is school fees. When asked how this loan will benefit her family, she replied, "it will increase milk for sale and for family consumption."

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Francia Ines

texts.es: Doña Francia  es originaria de san Marcos, Carazo, casada y madre de dos hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de refrescos  y recargas electrónicas.  Esta agradecida con Kiva y MiCredito por haberle otorgado el credito anterior ya que este fue de mucha ayuda para mejorar su calidad de vida y abastecer a sus clientes. Ella utilizo el credito anterior para comprar gaseosas al por mayor y recargas. Solicita este nuevo crédito para comprar: jugos, gaseosas al por mayor y recargas telefónicas con el fin de abastecer su negocio y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Estima que el crédito será de mucha ayuda ya que aumentara sus ventas e ingresos.  su meta próxima es mejorar la infraestructura de su casa.
texts.en:
Francia’s from San Marcos, Carazo.  She’s married and mother of two children.  She’s a merchant by profession.  She sells soft-drinks and phone charge cards.  She’s grateful to Kiva and MiCrédito for granting her previous loan that was of much help for her to improve her quality of life and to supply her customers.

She used the previous loan to buy soft-drinks at wholesale and mobile phone charge cards.  She’s asking for this new loan to buy juices and soft-drinks at wholesale and phone recharge cards to stock her business and meet  customer demand.  She figures that the loan will be of great help to her for her sales and income will increase.  Her next goal is to make improvements to her home’s infrastructure.

loans.use: to buy juice and soft-drinks at wholesale and to buy mobile phone charge cards.

loans.name: Luisa Etelvina

texts.es:
Luisa es una mujer de 52 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ella es vida desde hace 10 años, Luisa es una persona entusiasta, trabajadora, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante.
Por iniciativa propia, Luisa trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y bebidas, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Luisa se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva,ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprará mayor cantidad y variedad de abarrotes y bebidas para abastecer su negocio, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener una vivienda segura y adecuada.
texts.en:
Luisa, 52, lives in the city of Pisco.  She’s been a widow for ten years.  Luisa’s enthusiastic and hardworking and focuses all he efforts into getting ahead.

On her own initiative she works in a small business selling groceries and beverages.  She works every day for about 10 hours and believes she does well because of her dedication and effort.

Luisa’s grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support they provided she will buy larger amounts and variety of groceries and beverages to stock her store.  She will then continue working and striving to reach her great dream: to have a safe, proper home.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel es un hombre de 31 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus padres y hermanos, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por superarse.
Por iniciativa propia, Miguel trabaja como auxiliar en el área de archivo de una empresa de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Miguel se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprara prendas de vestir para damas y caballeros para su venta,de esta manera podrá iniciar su negocio de venta de ropa, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de estudiar una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Miguel, 31, is a single man living with his parents and siblings in the city of Pucallpa.  He’s very hardworking, enthusiastic and focuses all his efforts into improving himself.

On his own initiative, Miguel works as an aide in the filing department in a local firm.  He works every day for about 10 hours and believes he does well because of his dedication and effort.

Miguel is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will buy women’s and men’s clothes to sell thus starting his clothing sales business.  He will then continue working and striving to reach his great dream: to study a professional career.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: So's Group

texts.en:
So is a mother in her early 30s residing in Battambang province.  She is blessed with three dependent kids, who are in school. 

The main sources of her family’s income are from rice farming and trading recycled items. Currently, the main challenge for her business is the shortage of working capital to support her two businesses. 

To overcome this challenge, she forms a group of three to get a new loan. So is a third-time borrower whereas her co-borrowers in a group of three are first-time borrowers with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner).  As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and to buy more recycled items for resale. 

She hopes that his purchase will support her business on time so that she can gain a good income from both her businesses.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and more recycled items for resale

loans.name: Maria Tomasa
